abstract: United Automobile Workers and Fiat Chrysler Automobiles tentatively agree on new contract.
lead_paragraph: The deal was reached after marathon bargaining sessions between the two sides that began on Sunday when the union picked Fiat Chrysler as the first company to negotiate with.

headline.main: Autoworkers’ Union Reaches Tentative Deal With Fiat Chrysler
headline.print_headline: Autoworkers’ Union Reaches Tentative Deal With Fiat Chrysler

snippet: The deal was reached after marathon bargaining sessions between the two sides that began on Sunday when the union picked Fiat Chrysler as the first company to negotiate with.
